title.rendered: PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES EXPANDS ITS SALES TEAM FOR U.S., CANADA AND LATIN AMERICA

content.rendered:
PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES EXPANDS ITS SALES TEAM FOR U.S., CANADA AND LATIN AMERICA

Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company, announced that it is once again expanding its sales team to support the continued growth of the company.

Ricardo Sierra will serve as the Regional Sales Director for Latin America. Mr. Sierra has more than 15 years of international sales experience and previously served as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Latin America at Seal Dynamics, a Heico company. He holds a Master of Business Administration, with a concentration in Finance and International Management from Tulane University and a Bachelor of Science degree in Industrial and Manufacturing Systems Engineering from Louisiana State University.

Derante Ellison joins the team as a Regional Sales Manager focused on the southern United States. Mr. Ellison has over eight years of sales experience in the aerospace industry and most recently served as a Regional Sales Manager for Avio-Diepen in Atlanta. He has a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration and Marketing from the University of Georgia.

Finally, Timothy Pine joins Professional Aircraft as Regional Sales Manager for the northeastern United States. Most recently, Mr. Pine served as a Sales Associate and Sales Analyst for Magellan Aviation Group. He earned a bachelor’s degree in Philosophy and Political Science with a concentration in American Government from Florida State University.

All three will be responsible for service sales in the business, commercial and government/military markets.
